testwhat

The testwhat package provides rich functionality to write Submission Correctness Tests for interactive R exercises on the DataCamp platform. The package is inspired by testthat, the standard for unit testing in R.

Reference

  • Teach on DataCamp: https://authoring.datacamp.com
  • What is an SCT? https://authoring.datacamp.com/courses/sct.html

Installation

library("devtools")
install_github("datacamp/testwhat")

Running tests

testwhat currently depends on the proprietary RBackend and RCompletion packages to run tests.

devtools::test()

For more details, questions and suggestions, contact us.
